entry.def: A dessertspoon is a spoon which is midway between the size of a teaspoon and a tablespoon. You use it to eat desserts.

entry.tran: 一点心匙的量;一中型匙的量
entry.def: You can refer to an amount of food resting on a dessertspoon as a dessertspoon of food.

means.word_mean: 1. as much as a dessertspoon will hold

auth_sentence.content: Using a dessertspoon, lower dollops of the bhaji batter into the hot oil in batches of four.
auth_sentence.res_content: Using a dessertspoon, lower dollops of the bhaji batter into the hot oil in batches of four.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Using a dessertspoon, lower dollops of the bhaji batter into the hot oil in batches of four.

auth_sentence.content: Using a dessertspoon, drop three large spoonfuls of the crumpet batter into each ring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Using a dessertspoon, drop three large spoonfuls of the crumpet batter into each ring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Using a dessertspoon, drop three large spoonfuls of the crumpet batter into each ring.

auth_sentence.content: Put them in a small pan with a heaped dessertspoon of sugar, barely cover with water and bring to a simmer.
